Process.name: BuildVehicle
Process.Description: AutoEdge|TheFactory vehicle build process. The vehicle bulid steps are taken from http://www.madehow.com/Volume-1/Automobile.html .
Process.Author: pjudge

Attribute.name: Objective
Attribute.Label: Objective
Attribute.Description: Objective for developing this process model. E.g. Objective is to automate order processing

Attribute.name: Goal
Attribute.Label: Goal
Attribute.Description: The goal of this process model. E.g. Goal is to reduce order processing cost by 10%

Attribute.name: OrganizationalUnit
Attribute.Label: Organizational Unit
Attribute.Description: The organizational unit that owns this process model

Attribute.name: Influencers
Attribute.Label: Influencers
Attribute.Description: People who have influenced development of this process model

Attribute.name: Risks
Attribute.Label: Risks
Attribute.Description: Risks associated with this process model

Attribute.name: Rewards
Attribute.Label: Rewards
Attribute.Description: Potential rewards on investment for this process model

Attribute.name: Executable
Attribute.Label: Executable
Attribute.Description: Can the Process Ever be made executable?

ExternalWS.name: FactoryLogin

Dataslot.Name: BuildStatus
Dataslot.name: BuildStatus
Dataslot.Label: BuildStatus:
Dataslot.Description: The status of the build step

Notes.Note:
STRING 256 true false true Savvion ProcessInstanceId STRING 256 true false true STRING 2000 true false true AETF User Context ID STRING 2000 true false true STRING 2000 true false true The status of the build step STRING 256 true false true STRING http://ec2-50-16-84-39.compute-1.amazonaws.com:8080/wsa/wsa1 2000 true true true BOOLEAN false 256 true false true The Order number for this order. LONG 0 256 true false true The processing of errors in the build process is its own sub-process. We don't show that here for complexity's sake.

Errors in the process are in all likelihood the result of QA failures on the line.

STRING 256 true false true Savvion ProcessInstanceId STRING 256 true false true STRING 2000 true false true AETF User Context ID STRING 2000 true false true STRING 2000 true false true The status of the build step STRING 256 true false true STRING http://ec2-50-16-84-39.compute-1.amazonaws.com:8080/wsa/wsa1 2000 true true true BOOLEAN false 256 true false true The Order number for this order. LONG 0 256 true false true No doubt the <step> + Complete<step> + error handling can be further modularised into its own sub-process

STRING 256 true false true Savvion ProcessInstanceId STRING 256 true false true STRING 2000 true false true AETF User Context ID STRING 2000 true false true STRING 2000 true false true The status of the build step STRING 256 true false true STRING http://ec2-50-16-84-39.compute-1.amazonaws.com:8080/wsa/wsa1 2000 true true true BOOLEAN false 256 true false true The Order number for this order. LONG 0 256 true false true The Complete* steps are completed externally, by a OpenEdge process, which is analogous to input received by a scanner on the factory floor which scans the being-built vehicle as it moves down the production line.
